claim_card.claim: An event horizon is reframed as a saturation boundary where I(r)=I* and ∂r I=0; inside, coherence becomes phase-locked rather than causally discontinuous.
claim_card.test_hook: In simulation, identify radii where I hits I* and gradient vanishes; test for phase-lock / suppressed diffusion behavior inside.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: At r = r_h, I(r_h) = I* and ∂r I|r_h = 0 ... event horizon is a saturation boundary
